overview: Embark on a journey of discovery and delve into the fascinating, mysterious and, at times, controversial world of paranormal investigation. Based mainly in New England, New Gravity Media touches base with some of the regions most respected paranormal researchers, mediums, scientists, skeptics, and of course... ghosts to bring you an in depth "behind the scenes" look at the subject that has the world afraid to sleep alone.
title: 14 Degrees - a Paranormal Documentary
